tgt_original: kutastato vīramuddhare-  dityāha - anulomavilomena svaravarṇāṃśca sādhaka iti |
koṣṭhadvātriṃśati saṃgṛhya pañcamena tu bheditam || 6 ||  etatsaṃkhyāntargatamiti |  koṣṭhakasaṃkhyāntargataṃ yathā bhavati tathā samuddharedityarthaḥ |

kasya vacanādetadityāśaṅkyāha - muneriti |  koṣṭhadvātriṃśati saṃgṛhyeti |  koṣṭheti nirvi-  bhaktim | kakārādhiṣṭhitaṃ koṣṭhakamārabhya dvātriṃśattamaṃ koṣṭhakaṃ sakārādhiṣṭhitaṃ gṛhyate |  kakārātprabhṛtigaṇanayā sakārāsyaiva grahaṇam |  sarvatraivaṃ koṣṭhakagrahaṇena koṣṭhakasthāne  cākṣaraṃ gṛhyate |
asyaivopayogitvāt |  koṣṭhatṛtīyamiti pāṭhe tālavyaśakārādhiṣṭhita-  mārabhya dantyasakārādhiṣṭhitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ guhyate |

pañcamena tu bheditamiti |  ukāreṇa viśe-  ṣitam || 6 ||  śatārdhārdhaṃ samādāya caturviṃśatibheditam |  koṣṭhaṣaṭtriṃśatimaṃ koṣṭhatrayeṇa bheditam || 7 ||  śatārdhārdhaṃ samādāyeti |  caturviṃśatibheditamiti |  tathā kakārādhiṣṭhitamārabhyetyarthaḥ |  caturviṃśatibheditam | catu-
tataḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi yena martyaṃ vaśaṃ nayet |
idānīṃ kevalaṃ vaśīkaraṇahomapaṭalamāha - tata ityādi |  yato vaśīkṛtāḥ sattvāḥ  svaśāsane niyojituṃ śakyāḥ |  tataḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi |
sasainyaṃ nṛpatiṃ vaśyaṃ ardhena tu vīramantriṇam |  maṃtriṇaṃ ca tadardhena saptāhādvaśamānayet || 4 ||
saptāhāditi |  māsatrayaṃ trisandhyamaṣṭottaraśatāhutidānaṃ vidhāya tataḥ saprāhahomena sādhya-  siddhiṃ dadāti sādhakāya |
sarvāvastho'pi vīreśaḥ saptāhāt sādhakasya ca || 2 ||  mahāsiddhiṃ pradadāti niśihomaparāyaṇaḥ |
[ nirdhūmaiḥ khadirāṅgāraiḥ tāpayecca prayatnataḥ || 14 ||  karadvayena tāṃ dhūliṃ nirmathya homayet |  siddhiṃ yāvad homitvaṃ gṛhītvā dhūlimeva hi || 15 ||  kṣiptāṃ tāṃ tatra nikhaned dhruvam | ]
śeṣaṃ subodham || 14-16 ||  āgacchati vāyuvegena nipatati sādhakopari |  paśuṃ vā yadi vā dūtīṃ kārayed [ vibhajed budhaḥ ] || 17 ||  tato vai kārayet karma dūtīgrahaṇameva ca |
sa tvari[ taṃ ta ]to gṛhya yāvatsā na dahyate |
karadvayeneti |  sahastrajāpānantaramuttarasādhakena sādhakasyāñjalau nikṣiptaṃ sampūrṇama-  bhagnakeśarādi |
jaleneti |  yatra tatpuṣpamuttarasādhakakarasaṃpuṭasthaṃ bhūtaṃ karadvayena sva-  kīyena || 21-13 ||
vaśaṃ ca kurute kṣipraṃ sa devāsuramānuṣān |
vācayā mārayet kruddho asyoccāṭanameva ca || 25 ||  nigrahaṃ kurute vācā evameveti sādhakaḥ |
tato mahānadyāṃ nābhimātre jale'vatīrya sahastraṃ japet |
narāsthimayaṃ kīlakaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulāṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yasya dvāre  nikhanet tasya gotrocchādo bhavati |
atha rājānaṃ rājamantriṇaṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo rāhadvāre mṛṇmayena pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā  aṣṭāṅgulaṃ sthāpayed budhaḥ |
prathame dine trīṇi mātuluṅga phalāni kusumamiśrāṇi  śatasahastraṃ juhuyāt vaśyo bhavati |
mṛṇmayīṃ pratikṛtimiti |  tasya hṛdi bhūrjādigataṃ tannāma tanmantravidirbhitam | rāja-  dvāre gopayet |
atha puruṣaṃ strīkartukāmena mṛtanarapuṣpāṇi kākāṇḍīphalāni bubhukṣitasya
pādau carmanakhādisaṃgṛhya samabhāgāni kārayet |  śaśakarudhireṇa piṣayet | ekādaśa-  guḍikāṃ chāyāśuṣkāṃ kārayet |
pratyānayane rātrau sandhyā[ yāṃ vā ]  ḍākinīṃ mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā baliṃ dadyāttataḥ svābhāviko bhavati || 5 ||
dravyamadravyaṃ kartukāmaḥ kanakaphalāni aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyād dravyamadravyaṃ bhavati |
athonmādaṃ kartukāmaḥ mahāśakunivāsaṃ  juhuyāt saptame divase anmādaṃ bhavati |
evaṃ sudivase haste baddhvā dvādaśame divase yasya
viḍāliromāṇi somagrahe saṃgṛhya yasya nāmnā mantreṇa juhoti sa bhasma gṛhya yasya  śirasi dāpayati sa viḍālo bhavati |  punarjayet svābhāviko bhavati || 6 ||
kākasnāyurajjuṃ gṛgyābhimantrya yasya gale badhnāti sa kāko bhavati | evaṃ
śirasi cūrṇaṃ dadāti sa strī bhavati || 4 ||
atha puruṣaṃ śvānaṃ kartukāmaḥ puṣpaloho nakulamastake sthāpya saptarātryāṣṭasahastraṃ
japet | aṣṭame divase kuṅkumena samaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭaśatābhimantrya cūrṇaṃ juhuyāt | tad
bhasma yasya śirasi dadāti sa śvāno bhavati |
hāsamantrasya homavidhiṃ vakṣye |  yena gomāṃsahomena vidhānasya vaśyasya karmaṇa āśu-
